item.description:
Board Development: How cultivate, recruit and effectively work with Board of Directors
Meeting Format

1. Introductions (15 mins)

3. Moderated discussion on specific topic (1 hour).
This meetup will benefit nonprofits seeking to build their first board, established nonprofits seeking to change the composition of their board or use their current board members more effectively.

4. Announcements, opportunities, connections (10 mins)

5.. Exchange business cards/social networking. (15 mins)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the room 15 minutes early. You'll recognize me from my photo!
item.why: Great people, opportunity to network, learn and share from a dynamic group of nonprofit professionals.
item.name: Board Development: How to cultivate, recruit and effectively use a strong Board.
